Policies: Cancellation Policy - If Any Client Cancels The Appointment Due To A Reason; 1) After Reaching The Venue - Travelling Charge With 25% Of The Total Services Booked. 2) 15 Days Before Or On The Date Of Booking - Full Refund.

Other Information.Brand Used: Kryolan, PAC, MAC, Maybelline And Other High Qualtity Brands
